description:
It`s time to put the Seven Code Chips into the Seven Code Pad and summon Dantemon! But what`s that thing coming down from the sky?!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Chou Kyodai Cometmon Shuurai!? Tobira o Hirake, Dantemon!
The Massive Cometmon`s Attack?! Open the Door, Dantemon!
超巨大コメットモン襲来!? 扉をひらけ, ダンテモン!
